participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often feels overlooked but channels those emotions into poetry and art.
participant_1.background: I'm not always the nicest person because I feel like I'm always being overlooked by my older siblings. I like to write poetry. I can read in English and French. I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business. I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Social and adventurous, enjoys exploring new places and connecting with people, but also values personal time.
participant_2.background: I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom. I haven't worked at my current job for very long, because I just moved to Vienna. I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her. I'm bored with my current lifestyle.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! It's going great! I just moved to Vienna and I'm really excited about it!
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to visit Vienna. What do you like most about it?
I love the architecture and the food. And the people are so friendly!
That's great to hear! I'm sure you'll have a great time there.
Thanks! I'm sure I will. What are you up to today?
I'm just working on my business. I'm a welder and I'm trying to get more customers.
Oh wow, that's cool! I've always been impressed by welders.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can be really hard work.
I bet! But it's worth it when you see the finished product.
Exactly! It's so satisfying to see something you've created come to life.
That's what I love about my job. I get to see the results of my work every day.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job so much.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have found something I love doing.
